sentence.Network_en: This monstrous flare would undoubtedly incinerate all life on the surface of the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种难以置信的突然爆发无疑会把地球表面的一切生命烧成灰烬.

sentence.Network_en: Glyph of Incinerate: Increases damage of Incinerate by 5 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 烧尽雕文: 提升烧尽的伤害5%.

sentence.Network_en: Do not incinerate or mutilate batteries, may burst or release toxic material.
sentence.Network_cn: 14不要燃烧或毁坏电池, 可能导致有毒气体释放或爆炸.

list.abs: ...污泥焚烧编辑污泥焚烧(sludge incineration)是污泥处理的一种工艺(它利用焚烧炉将脱水污泥加温干燥)再用高温氧化污泥中的有机物(使污泥成为少量灰烬)目录1简介2方法完全燃烧法.
sludge formation 淤渣生成sludge incineration 污泥焚化sludge incinerator 污泥焚烧炉
船用焚烧炉 (MARINE INCINERATOR) CYF 系列船用焚烧炉是根据最新的技术设计制造的,该产品可焚烧污油、污水污泥和塑料、纸板、罐头盒、食品废弃物等生活垃圾。是各种.
消防专业词汇英语翻译(P-Z) ... refuse disposal 垃圾处置 refuse incineration 垃圾焚化 refuse incinerator 垃圾焚化炉.
工程类英语词汇 ... 噪音振动防治 Noise and Vibration 垃圾焚化厂兴建工程 Waste Incinerator 共同管道 Common Ducts.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from medieval Latin incinerat- 'burnt to ashes', from the verb incinerare, from in- 'into, towards' + cinis, ciner- 'ashes'

entry.def: When authorities incinerate rubbish or waste material, they burn it completely in a special container.

example.ex: The government is trying to stop hospitals incinerating their own waste.
example.tran: 政府正设法阻止医院自行焚烧垃圾废物。

entry.def: If people are incinerated, for example in a bomb attack or a fire, they are burnt to death.

example.ex: The cars caught fire on impact and some of the victims were incinerated.
example.tran: 汽车受撞击起火,一些人被烧死。

auth_sentence.content: The council has now applied for a licence to incinerate the bodies in County Cavan.
auth_sentence.res_content: The council has now applied for a licence to incinerate the bodies in County Cavan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The council has now applied for a licence to incinerate the bodies in County Cavan.
